message: Let's make a deal. I take $70, you take $30.  It's in your best interest to accept now, as the value decreases rapidly with each round.
I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  Since the money is losing value faster for you, it's in both our interests to reach a deal now.
Bob, this is your last chance for a decent share. I'm offering you $35.  The value will plummet next round, making it pointless to continue.
